Keyword

  • List keywords of the given placement
  • Get keywords details of the given placement

List keywords of the given placement

GET /medias/placements/:placement_id/keywords

Parameters

page
Optional integer - the start index
per_page
Optional integer - the max-results

You can use this in combination with page to retrieve a subset of elements, or use it alone to restrict the number of returned elements, starting with the first. If you do not use the per_page parameter in your query, your feed returns the default maximum of 30 entries.

Response

Status: 200 OK
X-RateLimit-Limit: 5000
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 4999
[

    {
        //Placement ID
        "placement_id":1
        //Keyword ID
        "order_num":1
        //Keyword Name
        "name": this is example
        //Target URL
        "target_url": http://www.admaster.com.cn
        //Creation Time
        "created_at": "2012-12-27T15:45:27Z"
    }
]

Get keywords details of the given placement

GET /medias/placements/:placemment_id/keywords/:id

Response

Status: 200 OK
X-RateLimit-Limit: 5000
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 4999
[

    {
        //Placement ID
        "placement_id":1
        //Keyword ID
        "order_num":1
        //Keyword Name
        "name": this is example
        //Target URL
        "target_url": http://www.admaster.com.cn
        //Creation Time
        "created_at": "2012-12-27T15:45:27Z"
    }
]
